extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  HLTH315 & 4th yr in a HLTH major or medial; PHED or KINE plan

basic.description: This seminar-style course involves critical assessment of HIV prevention interventions situated at varying levels of analysis and action. Consistent with the epidemiology of HIV/AIDS, the course focuses on interventions for disadvantaged and marginalized populations. Students should be prepared to lead discussion and present in class.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Seminar on HIV/AIDS Prevention
